body.name: TonGass (2-Pack, Mint Green Dishwasher Basket for Straw Chopsticks Dishwasher Utensil Basket Universal for Small Item Chopsticks Straw Holder Dishwasher Drainer Basket for Washing Drying or Storing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 14 mins
features: Simplify Cleaning Routine - Revolutionize your dishwashing process with our dishwasher basket, specifically designed to hold a variety of small utensils such as chopsticks, small spoons, knives, and even straws, making washing a breeze.

Thorough Cleaning - Engineered with strategic small holes at the bottom to prevent items from slipping through, and spacious openings on the sides to allow water and detergent to circulate freely. This design ensures a thorough wash for all your utensils, leaving them spotless.

Carefree Reusable Straw Care - Bid farewell to flimsy straw-cleaning brushes. Our dishwasher-friendly straw basket effortlessly accommodates reusable straws and small utensils, guaranteeing they receive a comprehensive cleaning alongside your other dishes.

Dishwasher-Safe and High-Temperature Resistant - Engineered for both washing and drying cycles, this dishwasher utensil basket withstands high temperatures. It's your ultimate solution for efficiently cleaning and drying chopsticks, straws, and various utensils.

Exceptional Durability and Universality - Crafted with durability in mind, our chopstick holder for dishwasher use fits most dishwasher models. The removable and reusable basket makes storage a breeze, easily fitting back into the dishwasher when it's time for your utensils to sparkle again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to wash small amounts of silverware
reviews.reviewText: I use one on the counter to collect silverware and keep the counter tidy while waiting to fill my dishwasher. I didn't think I needed 2 but it's actually really nice for rotating, one on the counter collecting while the other is being washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dishwasher basket for washing
reviews.reviewText: This basket is ideal for organizing straws, spoons, knives, forks, and chopsticks, making them dishwasher-ready. Its size perfectly fits into the dishwasher, optimizing space. Using this basket significantly saves dishwasher space, and I find it very practical for my needs. Overall, I'm thoroughly pleased with its functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: My silverware kept slipping through the holes of my other caddy. I am happy to have found something with tiny holes. I was worried the water would pool but the holes are adequate for water yet too small for even the smaller utensil to fall through. I wish they were larger or just one long unit. Even using two they don’t not hold as much as my precious long caddy. But they are as sturdy and nice looking. And loading the dishwasher goes much faster now as I don’t have to be so careful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: We have no dishwasher, but wanted these for draining the utensils after washing. I like the light color, and the fact that there are dividers. There’s nothing worse than having a single unit to drain all utensils. I have them sitting on a silicone mat, and work nicely.They are lightweight, but I don’t need anything heavy, nor would I think that a heavier object would be good for holding utensils in a dishwasher.The space between the dividers leaves enough room to utilize cooking utensils as well.They were packaged very well, and included adhesive hooks for hanging, should you choose to use that option.For me, they were exactly what I needed, and had been looking for, for quite some time. Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The baskets in my dishwasher had worn out and the holes in the bottoms of the baskets were too big to include things like straws and other small items. These baskets solved that problem!There are two that come in a package and they are perfectly sized to fit in the dishwasher to hold utensils and other small things.Glad that I ordered these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars for all the small stuff
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy to have a place for all my small items like chopsticks, drink straws, skewers, and straw covers. This keeps them from falling down into the dishwasher! Extra bonus is that you get two! Fits my dishwasher perfectly!
